name: MyFayda eKYC
description: SignUp With Fayda ID: MyFayda eKYC is a digital identity solution integrating with the Fayda National ID system, empowering users to securely verify their identities. Supports trusted digital services for Ethiopia's growing digital economy.

name: MedHub Ethiopia
description: The first Electronic Medical Record (EMR) system in Ethiopia, designed for healthcare providers. Integrates with national ID for seamless patient verification and improves workflow efficiency and healthcare delivery.

name: WZSIT Web-App
description: Comprehensive tech support platform for Wolayita Zone, including online appointments, video consultations, and real-time troubleshooting guides. Designed to streamline technical assistance for local users.

name: St. Mary Finance Management System
description: Cloud-based finance system for parish operations. Automates accounting, enhances audit efficiency, and ensures transparency in financial decisions.

name: Wa-Leba+ AI Surveillance SaaS
description: AI-driven SaaS platform integrating IP cameras with machine learning for real-time intrusion detection, trespassing alerts, and customer traffic analytics. Scalable for national security applications.

name: Offline Book Store App
description: Mobile app for offline access to textbooks, practice tests, and study materials for software engineering students. Reduces dependency on internet connectivity and improves study efficiency.

name: Bible Trivia Game
description: Desktop trivia game for Sunday school students, providing an interactive and educational experience. Supports limited resources and simple UI for maximum engagement.

name: Vehicle Management System (Prototype)
description: Fleet management segment for a client. Includes vehicle tracking, maintenance scheduling, and driver authentication, built using MERN stack.

name: AI Chatbot Platform
description: Enterprise-grade AI chatbot with natural language processing for customer support automation. Integrates with multiple platforms and provides analytics for user interaction.

name: E-commerce MERN Clone
description: A full-stack clone of a popular e-commerce platform for learning and prototyping purposes. Implements product catalog, user authentication, payment integration, and admin panel.
